titles.title: Jesus Paid It All (hymn of the Church)

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus paid it all, All to Him I owe Sin had left a crimson stain He washed it white as snow{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I hear the Savior say Thy strength indeed is small Child of weakness watch and pray Find in Me thine all in all{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lord now indeed I find Thy power and Thine alone Can change the leper's spots And melt the heart of stone{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}For nothing good have I Whereby Thy grace to claim I'll wash my garments white In the blood of Calvary's Lamb{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}And when before the throne I stand in Him complete Jesus died my soul to save My lips shall still repeat{/lang-eng}
